short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension let you enter hours and mins and calculate the Rp go live time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tiny extension accept hours and mins and when you press the Calculate button it prints the time in the future EDT and your localtime zone
